```{r}
## Task 1: Exploring Data Types in R

# 1.1 Atomické typy
teplota <- 23.5
gravitacia <- 9.8
polomer_km <- 6400.2
hodnotenie <- 4.7

mesiace <- as.integer(2)
mesta <- as.integer(12)
obyvatelia_miliony <- as.integer(50)

ma_vodu <- TRUE
je_obyvatelna <- TRUE

nazov_planety <- "Kubova planeta"
oblast <- "region stropkov"
kategoria <- "majestatna"

cat("Planéta", nazov_planety, "v oblasti", oblast,
    "má", mesiace, "mesiace,",
    obyvatelia_miliony, "miliónov obyvateľov,",
    "teplotu", teplota, "°C a hodnotenie", hodnotenie, ".")

# 1.2 Vektory
vektor_numeric <- c(teplota, gravitacia, polomer_km, hodnotenie,
                    mesiace, mesta, obyvatelia_miliony)

vektor_sekvencia <- seq(20, 100, by = 5)

set.seed(1)
vektor_logicky <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), size = 10, replace = TRUE)

# 1.3 Matica
set.seed(123)
matica_planeta <- matrix(sample(-50:50, 9), nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
rownames(matica_planeta) <- c("Auroria", "Zephyria", "Lunara")
colnames(matica_planeta) <- c("Energia", "Zdroje", "Populácia")

# 1.4 Zoznam
zoznam_planeta <- list(
  atomicke = list(teplota, gravitacia, polomer_km, hodnotenie,
                  mesiace, mesta, obyvatelia_miliony,
                  ma_vodu, je_obyvatelna,
                  nazov_planety, oblast, kategoria),
  vektory = list(vektor_numeric, vektor_sekvencia, vektor_logicky),
  matica = matica_planeta,
  popis = "Kubova planeta je majestatna planéta v regione Stropkov s mestami a zdrojmi."
)

# 1.5 Faktor
stadium_vyvoja <- factor(c("nízke", "stredné", "vysoké", "stredné", "vysoké", "nízke"),
                         levels = c("nízke", "stredné", "vysoké"))

# 1.6 Dátový rámec
df_planeta <- data.frame(
  Mesto = c("Solara", "Nivara", "Celestria", "Orionis", "Velora", "Thalora"),
  Populacia_miliony = c(5, 8, 12, 7, 10, 8),
  Pobrežné = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE),
  Typ = c("hlavné", "priemyselné", "kultúrne", "výskumné", "obchodné", "obytné")
)
df_planeta$Index_hustoty <- df_planeta$Populacia_miliony / 10


## Task 2: Subsetting & Missing Data

# 2.1 Vektory
vektor_sekvencia[3]
vektor_sekvencia[2:5]
vektor_sekvencia[vektor_sekvencia > 20]

vektor_logicky[vektor_logicky]
which(vektor_logicky)

# 2.2 Zoznam
zoznam_planeta$popis
zoznam_planeta[[3]]
zoznam_planeta$vektory[[1]][2]

# 2.3 Dátový rámec
head(df_planeta, 3)
df_planeta[4, 1]
df_planeta$Pobrežné

df_subset <- df_planeta[df_planeta$Populacia_miliony > 8, ]
df_subset

df_subset_2 <- df_planeta[df_planeta$Typ %in% c("hlavné", "obchodné"), ]
df_subset_2

# 2.4 NA hodnoty
df_corrupted <- df_planeta
df_corrupted[2, 2] <- NA
df_corrupted[5, 3] <- NA
df_corrupted[6, 4] <- NA

sum(is.na(df_corrupted))
colSums(is.na(df_corrupted))

mean(df_corrupted$Populacia_miliony)
mean(df_corrupted$Populacia_miliony, na.rm = TRUE)

df_clean <- na.omit(df_corrupted)
df_clean

# 2.5 Bonus: which()
highest_pop_index <- which.max(df_planeta$Populacia_miliony)
df_planeta[highest_pop_index, ]

lowest_pop_index <- which.min(df_planeta$Populacia_miliony)
df_planeta[lowest_pop_index, ]
```

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
